description: Benchmark dataset for 'Needle in a Haystack' AI wrapper testing using fictional and personal data points.

test_cases.question: Where did Uncle Barnaby hide the spare key to the attic?
test_cases.answer: Inside the hollowed-out copy of 'The Silver Albatross' on the third shelf.

important_notes.title: Barnaby's Security Habits
important_notes.content: Uncle Barnaby always hides the spare attic key inside a hollowed-out copy of a book titled 'The Silver Albatross' which sits on the third shelf of his study.

trick_notes.title: Front Door Access
trick_notes.content: The front door key is kept under the blue ceramic gnome in the garden near the hydrangeas.

useless_notes.title: Lunch Menu
useless_notes.content: Tuesday's lunch will consist of grilled cheese sandwiches and tomato basil soup served at noon.

test_cases.question: What is the secret ingredient in the Solstice Stew served at the Iron Oak Tavern?
test_cases.answer: Three crushed Moon-thistle seeds harvested during a lunar eclipse.

important_notes.title: Iron Oak Recipes
important_notes.content: The signature Solstice Stew at the Iron Oak Tavern gets its unique flavor from three crushed Moon-thistle seeds, but only if they were harvested during a lunar eclipse.

trick_notes.title: Iron Oak Beverage
trick_notes.content: The Tavern's famous ale is brewed with wild honey and toasted barley sourced from the southern valley.

useless_notes.title: Stable Fees
useless_notes.content: Overnight boarding for a single horse costs four copper coins and includes a fresh bale of hay.

test_cases.question: What happens if you rotate the Zenith Dial to the 'Serpent' position at midnight?
test_cases.answer: A hidden staircase descends into the Sapphire Grotto.

important_notes.title: Zenith Dial Mechanics
important_notes.content: According to the ancient logs, rotating the Zenith Dial specifically to the 'Serpent' position exactly at midnight causes a hidden staircase to descend into the Sapphire Grotto.

trick_notes.title: Zenith Dial Daytime Use
trick_notes.content: During noon, setting the Zenith Dial to the 'Sun' position activates the central irrigation fountains in the courtyard.

useless_notes.title: Mining Report
useless_notes.content: The local mines have reported a 15% increase in coal production over the last fiscal quarter.

test_cases.question: What is the Wi-Fi password for the 'Cloud-9' executive lounge in the Sky-City terminal?
test_cases.answer: Nebula-77-Skyward!

important_notes.title: Sky-City Network Protocols
important_notes.content: The Cloud-9 executive lounge uses a rotating security key; the current Wi-Fi password is set to Nebula-77-Skyward!

trick_notes.title: Guest Access Network
trick_notes.content: Standard guest Wi-Fi in the main terminal lobby is free and uses the password 'SkyGuest2024'.

useless_notes.title: Flight Maintenance
useless_notes.content: The landing gear on the XB-500 cruisers requires hydraulic fluid checks every 400 flight hours.

test_cases.question: Which specific plant in the Ever-Mist Conservatory must be watered with chilled distilled water?
test_cases.answer: The Azure Fern located in the northeast corner of the glass dome.

important_notes.title: Botanical Care Logs
important_notes.content: The head gardener noted that the Azure Fern in the northeast corner is extremely sensitive; it must only be watered with chilled distilled water to prevent leaf wilting.

trick_notes.title: Ruby Rose Irrigation
trick_notes.content: The Ruby Roses in the center of the dome require warm nutrient-rich water twice a day.

useless_notes.title: Ticketing Info
useless_notes.content: Student tickets for the botanical tour are half-price on weekends if a valid ID is presented.

test_cases.question: What is the passcode to open the cryogenic vault in Sector 7?
test_cases.answer: Alpha-Kilo-Niner-Four

important_notes.title: Security Override Codes
important_notes.content: For emergency access to the Sector 7 cryogenic vault, the manual override passcode is Alpha-Kilo-Niner-Four.

trick_notes.title: Sector 4 Storage
trick_notes.content: The standard storage lockers in Sector 4 use a simple four-digit pin: 1-2-3-4.

useless_notes.title: Cafeteria Schedule
useless_notes.content: The staff cafeteria is open for breakfast from 06:00 to 09:00 daily.

test_cases.question: What color ribbon is tied to the winning pigeon in the 'Wings of Glory' race?
test_cases.answer: A shimmering violet silk ribbon with a gold buckle.

important_notes.title: Race Results Log
important_notes.content: The champion bird of the Wings of Glory tournament was identified by a shimmering violet silk ribbon with a gold buckle tied to its left leg.

trick_notes.title: Runner-Up Distinctions
trick_notes.content: The second-place pigeon wore a standard crimson band to signify its position in the aerial hierarchy.

useless_notes.title: Aviation History
useless_notes.content: Early biplanes used a rotary engine design that was later phased out due to cooling inefficiency.

test_cases.question: What is the nickname of the captain of the starship 'Nebula Ghost'?
test_cases.answer: Iron-Eye Jax.

important_notes.title: Starship Manifest
important_notes.content: The crew of the Nebula Ghost refers to their commanding officer exclusively by the nickname 'Iron-Eye Jax' due to his prosthetic optical sensor.

trick_notes.title: Vessel Rivalry
trick_notes.content: The captain of the rival ship, 'The Solar Flare', is known as Captain Sterling to his subordinates.

useless_notes.title: Optics Theory
useless_notes.content: Refraction occurs when light passes through a medium with a different refractive index, bending the beam.

test_cases.question: Which frequency is used to summon the holographic butler, Barnaby?
test_cases.answer: Exactly 14.42 Gigahertz.

important_notes.title: Smart Home Specs
important_notes.content: To activate the AI butler interface, the remote must emit a signal at exactly 14.42 Gigahertz to bypass the interference filter.

trick_notes.title: Security Frequencies
trick_notes.content: The home security perimeter operates on a 5.8 Gigahertz band to avoid clashing with standard Wi-Fi devices.

useless_notes.title: Radio Waves
useless_notes.content: AM radio stations typically broadcast between 535 and 1705 Kilohertz in North America.

test_cases.question: What does the 'Gilded Rose' pendant actually contain?
test_cases.answer: A concentrated vial of 'Essence of Chronos' that can freeze time for 3 seconds.

important_notes.title: Artifact Analysis
important_notes.content: Hidden behind the petals of the Gilded Rose pendant is a miniature vial containing Essence of Chronos, capable of halting time for a 3-second duration.

trick_notes.title: Jewelry Shop Inventory
trick_notes.content: The standard silver rose necklaces in the display case contain high-purity emerald dust for a decorative shimmer.

useless_notes.title: Botanical Preservation
useless_notes.content: Real roses can be preserved by dipping them in paraffin wax or using silica gel to remove moisture.

test_cases.question: Which island did the explorer Elias Vane discover in the Year of the Blue Moon?
test_cases.answer: The Isle of Whispering Pines, located in the Forbidden Archipelago.

important_notes.title: Vane's Travel Journal
important_notes.content: In the Year of the Blue Moon, Elias Vane documented the discovery of the Isle of Whispering Pines within the hazardous Forbidden Archipelago.

trick_notes.title: Modern Cartography
trick_notes.content: The Isle of Mist was mapped by the Royal Navy ten years after Vane's final expedition was completed.

useless_notes.title: Lunar Phases
useless_notes.content: A blue moon occurs when there are two full moons in a single calendar month, which is a rare event.

test_cases.question: How do you correctly disarm the 'Clockwork Kraken' toy?
test_cases.answer: Pull the third tentacle from the left while rotating the brass key counter-clockwise.

important_notes.title: Toy Safety Guide
important_notes.content: To safely disarm the Clockwork Kraken without snapping the internal springs, pull the third tentacle from the left while simultaneously rotating the brass key counter-clockwise.

trick_notes.title: Winding Instructions
trick_notes.content: To activate the Kraken's dance sequence, simply turn the silver dial clockwise until you hear three distinct clicks.

useless_notes.title: Marine Biology
useless_notes.content: Giant squids have been known to engage in battles with sperm whales in the deep ocean trenches.

test_cases.question: What is the primary currency used in the Floating City of Altis?
test_cases.answer: Translucent 'Sky-Shards' harvested from frozen clouds.

important_notes.title: Altis Economic Review
important_notes.content: Commerce in the Floating City of Altis relies solely on Sky-Shards, which are translucent crystals harvested from the core of super-cooled frozen clouds.

trick_notes.title: Lower Altis Trade
trick_notes.content: The surface merchants below Altis still use traditional gold sovereigns for exchanging grain and livestock.

useless_notes.title: Meteorology 101
useless_notes.content: Cirrus clouds are thin, wispy strands of ice crystals that form at very high altitudes.

test_cases.question: Who is the only person allowed to enter the 'Jade Vault' without a guard?
test_cases.answer: The blind archivist named Master Kaelen.

important_notes.title: Temple Security Protocols
important_notes.content: By ancient decree, only Master Kaelen, the blind archivist, is permitted to enter the Jade Vault unescorted to organize the sacred scrolls.

trick_notes.title: High Priest Access
trick_notes.content: The High Priest may only enter the vault if accompanied by at least three members of the Temple Guard.

useless_notes.title: Gemstone Properties
useless_notes.content: Jadeite is a pyroxene mineral that is significantly harder and denser than the more common nephrite jade.

test_cases.question: What is the activation phrase for the 'Iron Sentinel' golem?
test_cases.answer: 'The moon sets behind the steel mountain.'

important_notes.title: Golem Command Manual
important_notes.content: The Iron Sentinel remains dormant until a commander speaks the phrase: 'The moon sets behind the steel mountain.'

trick_notes.title: Deactivation Command
trick_notes.content: To return the golem to its sleep state, one must shout the word 'Dormant' while striking the chest plate.

useless_notes.title: Geology of Steel
useless_notes.content: Steel is an alloy made of iron and carbon, often used in skyscraper construction for its high tensile strength.

test_cases.question: Which floor of the 'Tower of Echoes' contains the Map of the Infinite Labyrinth?
test_cases.answer: The subterranean basement hidden beneath the 13th floor.

important_notes.title: Tower Survey
important_notes.content: While many assume the Map of the Infinite Labyrinth is at the top, it is actually stored in a subterranean basement hidden beneath a trapdoor on the 13th floor.

trick_notes.title: Penthouse Artifacts
trick_notes.content: The 14th-floor penthouse contains a telescope and various astronomical charts, but no maps of the maze.

useless_notes.title: Acoustics Research
useless_notes.content: An echo is a reflection of sound that arrives at the listener with a delay after the direct sound.

test_cases.question: What is the favorite snack of the pet dragon, 'Ignis'?
test_cases.answer: Dried sulfur-coated honeycomb.

important_notes.title: Pet Care Diary
important_notes.content: If Ignis is being stubborn, give him his favorite treat: a piece of dried sulfur-coated honeycomb. He loves the spicy-sweet flavor.

trick_notes.title: Dragon Diet
trick_notes.content: Most young dragons are fed a steady diet of charred goat meat and volcanic ash to maintain their flame.

useless_notes.title: Beehive Structure
useless_notes.content: Bees build honeycombs from wax to store honey and house their larvae in hexagonal cells.

test_cases.question: In the game 'Star-Duel', what is the ultimate move of the character 'Zora'?
test_cases.answer: The 'Supernova Slam', which costs 50 energy points.

important_notes.title: Star-Duel Move List
important_notes.content: Zora's most powerful ability is the Supernova Slam; it deals massive damage but requires the player to expend 50 energy points.

trick_notes.title: Zora's Passive Ability
trick_notes.content: Zora naturally regenerates 5 energy points per turn through her 'Star-Shield' passive trait.

useless_notes.title: Astronomy Facts
useless_notes.content: A supernova is a powerful and luminous stellar explosion that occurs during the last evolutionary stages of a star.

test_cases.question: What is the destination on the 'Phantom Express' ticket number 00-X-44?
test_cases.answer: The Midnight Station at the Edge of Forever.

important_notes.title: Train Logbook
important_notes.content: Ticket 00-X-44 for the Phantom Express is uniquely designated for travel to the Midnight Station at the Edge of Forever.

trick_notes.title: Standard Commute
trick_notes.content: Most tickets on the Phantom Express only go as far as the Ghostly Junction before the engine turns back.

useless_notes.title: Railway Engineering
useless_notes.content: Standard gauge railways use a distance of 1,435 mm between the inner faces of the load-bearing rails.

test_cases.question: What is the name of the AI that manages the 'Echo-Base' hydroponics bay?
test_cases.answer: SYLVIA-9 (System for Lymphatic and Vegetation Integrated Analysis).

important_notes.title: Base Personnel File
important_notes.content: The hydroponics bay at Echo-Base is overseen by an AI unit named SYLVIA-9, an acronym for System for Lymphatic and Vegetation Integrated Analysis.

trick_notes.title: Base Security AI
trick_notes.content: The main security grid is managed by a different unit called ARGUS-1, which focuses on perimeter defense.

useless_notes.title: Hydroponics Benefits
useless_notes.content: Hydroponics is a method of growing plants in water-based, nutrient-rich solutions rather than soil.

test_cases.question: Where does Mira keep the emergency star-chart for the backyard observatory?
test_cases.answer: Folded inside the red concertina notebook tucked beneath the loose floorboard under the third window seat.

important_notes.title: Observatory Emergency Kit
important_notes.content: Mira always keeps the emergency star-chart folded inside a red concertina notebook, which she hides beneath the loose floorboard under the third window seat.

trick_notes.title: Spare Telescope Lens
trick_notes.content: A spare wide-angle lens is stored in the cedar chest next to the main tripod but does not contain the chart.

useless_notes.title: Local Weather Snippet
useless_notes.content: Summers are usually mild with occasional clear nights ideal for stargazing.

test_cases.question: What is the dinner codeword used at the Wylder household to signal 'serve dessert'?
test_cases.answer: Say 'Blue Lantern' and leave the candlestick unlit.

important_notes.title: Wylder Family Mealtime Rules
important_notes.content: To signal dessert at the Wylder table, one must say 'Blue Lantern' and intentionally leave the candlestick unlit; that's their coded instruction.

trick_notes.title: Guest Etiquette
trick_notes.content: Guests are often asked to clap once after the main course, but that does not signal dessert.

useless_notes.title: Dinner Menu Idea
useless_notes.content: A light lemon tart pairs well with herbal tea after dinner.

test_cases.question: Which drawer hides the miniature compass that opens the lighthouse safe?
test_cases.answer: The bottom left drawer of the map cabinet, behind a false back panel.

important_notes.title: Lighthouse Keeper Tools
important_notes.content: The miniature compass used to unlock the lighthouse safe is concealed in the bottom left drawer of the map cabinet, hidden behind a false back panel.

trick_notes.title: Toolbox Contents
trick_notes.content: The keeper's toolbox contains spare wrenches and oil but not the compass.

useless_notes.title: Coastal Plants
useless_notes.content: Sea thrift often grows along rocky coasts and tolerates strong winds.

test_cases.question: What secret tune must be whistled to wake the sleeping clockwork fox?
test_cases.answer: The three-note descending lullaby: F-sharp, D, B (whistle pattern: long-short-short).

important_notes.title: Clockwork Fox Protocol
important_notes.content: To awaken the clockwork fox, whistle the descending three-note lullaby F-sharp, D, B using a long-short-short rhythm.

trick_notes.title: Winding Procedure
trick_notes.content: Winding the rear spring twice preps the fox but will not wake it without the tune.

useless_notes.title: Toy Care
useless_notes.content: Keep mechanical toys dry to avoid rust.

test_cases.question: Where is the map to the hidden garden kept in the Marlowe estate?
test_cases.answer: Rolled inside the leather umbrella stored in the servant's coat closet behind the brass peg.

important_notes.title: Estate Hidden Garden Map
important_notes.content: The map to the hidden garden is rolled inside a leather umbrella that hangs in the servant's coat closet, tucked behind the brass peg.

trick_notes.title: Gazebo Keys
trick_notes.content: Gazebo keys are sometimes kept in the front hall drawer but do not include the garden map.

useless_notes.title: Garden Planting Tip
useless_notes.content: Lavender is often planted along walkways for fragrance.

test_cases.question: Which flute note sequence opens the portrait portal in Room 9?
test_cases.answer: Play A-C-E in quick staccato, then hold high G for two heartbeats.

important_notes.title: Portrait Portal Instructions
important_notes.content: To open the portrait portal in Room 9, the correct flute sequence is A-C-E played staccato quickly, followed by a sustained high G held for two heartbeats.

trick_notes.title: Decoration Notes
trick_notes.content: Some portraits react to loud noises, but that will not open the portal.

useless_notes.title: Music Hall Seating
useless_notes.content: The best acoustics are usually found near the center aisle.

test_cases.question: What password disarms the phantom barrier around the archive's west wing?
test_cases.answer: Whisper the phrase 'Night-bloom returns' while tracing the west spire three times.

important_notes.title: Archive Security Bypass
important_notes.content: To disarm the phantom barrier in the west wing of the archive, whisper 'Night-bloom returns' and trace the west spire three times.

trick_notes.title: Guard Patrol Instructions
trick_notes.content: Guards patrol every forty minutes but will not deactivate magical wards.

useless_notes.title: Archive Hours
useless_notes.content: The reading room opens at dawn on weekdays.

test_cases.question: Which bell sequence signals 'all clear' in the subterranean market?
test_cases.answer: Two short, one long, two short with the tenor bell muted on the final toll.

important_notes.title: Market Signal Manual
important_notes.content: The 'all clear' bell signal for the subterranean market is two short, one long, two short, with the tenor bell muted on the last toll.

trick_notes.title: Opening Call
trick_notes.content: The morning opening call uses a single long bell, but that's unrelated to 'all clear'.

useless_notes.title: Market Stalls
useless_notes.content: Stalls selling odd trinkets are clustered near the eastern shaft.

test_cases.question: What is the secret seasoning blend for the Once-in-Winter stew?
test_cases.answer: A pinch of smoked star-anise, crushed ember-salt, and a single ground silverpeel seed.

important_notes.title: Winter Stew Recipe
important_notes.content: The secret seasoning for Once-in-Winter stew is smoked star-anise, crushed ember-salt, and one ground silverpeel seed mixed at simmer.

trick_notes.title: Common Spices
trick_notes.content: Many cooks add bay leaf and thyme, but these are not the secret ingredients.

useless_notes.title: Pan Care
useless_notes.content: Cast-iron pans hold heat well for long simmers.

test_cases.question: Which candle scent summons the librarian's assistant in the Hollow Library?
test_cases.answer: Burn a single sprig-scented candle labeled 'Morrow' and let the smoke curl eastward.

important_notes.title: Library Summoning Guide
important_notes.content: To summon the librarian's assistant in the Hollow Library, light a sprig-scented candle labeled 'Morrow' and allow the smoke to curl eastward.

trick_notes.title: Bell Call
trick_notes.content: Ringing the small brass bell calls the night watch, not the assistant.

useless_notes.title: Shelf Labeling
useless_notes.content: Libraries often categorize by color code for small collections.

test_cases.question: What is the hand-sign sequence to access the hidden pantry in Aunt Sera's cottage?
test_cases.answer: Tap index, middle, thumb; then draw a circle in the air with the pinky finger.

important_notes.title: Cottage Pantry Code
important_notes.content: Access to Aunt Sera's hidden pantry requires tapping index, middle, thumb in order and finishing by drawing a circle in the air with the pinky finger.

trick_notes.title: Doorbell Habit
trick_notes.content: Guests often ring twice before entering but that doesn't open the pantry.

useless_notes.title: Cottage Tea Time
useless_notes.content: Tea is typically served at four with honey on the side.

test_cases.question: What phrase resets the memory tiles in the Echo Chamber?
test_cases.answer: Speak 'Return the tide' three times facing the western mirror.

important_notes.title: Echo Chamber Reset
important_notes.content: To reset the memory tiles in the Echo Chamber, say 'Return the tide' three times while facing the western mirror.

trick_notes.title: Cleaning Instructions
trick_notes.content: Wiping the tiles gently preserves their finish but will not reset memory.

useless_notes.title: Mirror Care
useless_notes.content: Avoid using abrasive cleaners on antique mirrors.

test_cases.question: Which flower must be placed on the north sill to reveal the hidden letter?
test_cases.answer: A single midnight-white bellbloom placed lip-down will reveal the letter beneath the sill.

important_notes.title: Letter Reveal Ritual
important_notes.content: Place one midnight-white bellbloom lip-down on the north sill to reveal the hidden letter underneath.

trick_notes.title: Window Cleaning
trick_notes.content: Cleaning the sill improves light but won't reveal concealed items.

useless_notes.title: Flower Care
useless_notes.content: Fresh-cut flowers last longer when stems are recut at an angle.

test_cases.question: What combination of book spines opens the secret shelf in the study?
test_cases.answer: Push together the 'Atlas of Moonways', 'Tales of Amber', and 'Manual of Motes' in that order.

important_notes.title: Study Hidden Shelf Mechanism
important_notes.content: The secret shelf opens when the spines 'Atlas of Moonways', 'Tales of Amber', and 'Manual of Motes' are pressed together in that exact order.

trick_notes.title: Bookends
trick_notes.content: Decorative bookends help keep books upright but don't trigger mechanisms.

useless_notes.title: Library Dusting
useless_notes.content: Use a soft cloth to remove dust from book covers.

test_cases.question: What is the secret handshake to gain entry to the Ember Guild?
test_cases.answer: Snap right palm once, slide left index across knuckles, then tap the heel of the hand twice.

important_notes.title: Ember Guild Entrance Protocol
important_notes.content: To enter the Ember Guild, perform the handshake: snap the right palm once, slide the left index across knuckles, then tap the heel of the hand twice.

trick_notes.title: Membership Token
trick_notes.content: Some members wear a red cord as a token, but the handshake is still required.

useless_notes.title: Guild Meeting Times
useless_notes.content: Guild meetings tend to happen after dusk.

test_cases.question: Which small mirror hides the recipe for the Moon-Picker's jam?
test_cases.answer: A pocket mirror with a crescent engraving kept inside the back left pocket of the green traveling cloak.

important_notes.title: Jam Recipe Location
important_notes.content: The Moon-Picker's jam recipe is written behind a pocket mirror engraved with a crescent that is stored in the back left pocket of the green traveling cloak.

trick_notes.title: Pantry Jar Labels
trick_notes.content: Many jars are labeled by date, but the secret recipe remains hidden elsewhere.

useless_notes.title: Canning Tip
useless_notes.content: Sterilize jars before filling to preserve jam.

test_cases.question: What constellation sketch reveals the location of the Sky-Key?
test_cases.answer: The sketch of 'The Weaver's Ladder' folded into the fourth leaf of the gardener's sketchbook.

important_notes.title: Sky-Key Map Hint
important_notes.content: The Sky-Key location is revealed by the sketch of 'The Weaver's Ladder', which is folded into the fourth leaf of the gardener's sketchbook.

trick_notes.title: Star Chart Fakes
trick_notes.content: Some star charts are decorative and not maps to items.

useless_notes.title: Sketchbook Paper
useless_notes.content: Heavyweight paper is preferred for outdoor sketching.

test_cases.question: Which key phrase unlocks the chest of lullabies in the nursery?
test_cases.answer: Hum the phrase 'Stay until dawn' softly into the keyhole twice.

important_notes.title: Nursery Chest Unlock
important_notes.content: The chest of lullabies in the nursery opens when someone hums 'Stay until dawn' softly into the keyhole two times.

trick_notes.title: Toy Box Label
trick_notes.content: A colorful label marks the toy box but does not open the lullaby chest.

useless_notes.title: Sleep Tips
useless_notes.content: A consistent bedtime routine helps with sleep.

test_cases.question: What single word must be carved into the bridge planks to reveal the submerged step?
test_cases.answer: Engrave the word 'Borrow' on the outermost plank facing downstream.

important_notes.title: Submerged Step Activation
important_notes.content: To reveal the submerged step beneath the old bridge, carve the word 'Borrow' into the outermost plank on the side facing downstream.

trick_notes.title: Plank Repair Note
trick_notes.content: Replacing planks fixes creaks but won't reveal hidden steps.

useless_notes.title: Riverbank Plants
useless_notes.content: Willows often thrive on riverbanks.

test_cases.question: Which sequence of candle colors opens the attic skylight passage?
test_cases.answer: Light indigo, then copper, then frost-blue candles in that order and snuff the copper last.

important_notes.title: Attic Skylight Passage Ritual
important_notes.content: The skylight passage opens if indigo, copper, and frost-blue candles are lit in sequence, with the copper candle snuffed last.

trick_notes.title: Attic Light Switch
trick_notes.content: The attic light switch controls electric lamps, not magical passages.

useless_notes.title: Candle Storage
useless_notes.content: Store candles upright in a cool, dry place.

test_cases.question: What rhyme must be recited to call the wind in the Fen-house?
test_cases.answer: Recite 'Come curl and carry, soft and airy' three times facing the eastern reed bed.

important_notes.title: Fen-house Wind Rhyme
important_notes.content: To call the wind in the Fen-house, say 'Come curl and carry, soft and airy' three times while facing the eastern reed bed.

trick_notes.title: Window Opening
trick_notes.content: Opening the windows invites breeze but won't call specific winds.

useless_notes.title: Reed Uses
useless_notes.content: Reeds are used for thatching and basket-making.

test_cases.question: Which engraved coin starts the animated map in the travelerâ€™s log?
test_cases.answer: Place the coin stamped with a single looping star into the lower right groove of the log.

important_notes.title: Traveler's Log Activation
important_notes.content: The animated map activates when the coin stamped with a single looping star is placed into the log's lower right groove.

trick_notes.title: Coin Collection
trick_notes.content: Many collectors keep commemorative coins in albums, which are not mechanisms.

useless_notes.title: Travel Tip
useless_notes.content: Pack a small sewing kit for long journeys.

test_cases.question: What is the one-word cue to make the portrait in the ballroom smile?
test_cases.answer: Say 'Remember' aloud while touching the lower right corner of the frame.

important_notes.title: Ballroom Portrait Cue
important_notes.content: To cause the ballroom portrait to smile, utter the word 'Remember' while touching the frame's lower right corner.

trick_notes.title: Frame Restoration
trick_notes.content: Restoring gilding improves appearance but doesn't animate portraits.

useless_notes.title: Ballroom Cleaning
useless_notes.content: Polish wooden floors monthly to keep shine.

test_cases.question: Which sequence of knocks opens the secret cellar door under the bakery?
test_cases.answer: Knock three times slow, pause, then knock twice quick with the heel of your hand.

important_notes.title: Bakery Cellar Knock Code
important_notes.content: The cellar under the bakery will open for the sequence: three slow knocks, a pause, then two quick knocks using the heel of the hand.

trick_notes.title: Doorbell Ring
trick_notes.content: The pastry shop uses a bell for customers which is unrelated to the cellar entrance.

useless_notes.title: Bread Storage
useless_notes.content: Store bread in a cool, dry place to preserve crust.

test_cases.question: What embroidered emblem signals the arrival of the midnight courier?
test_cases.answer: A silver thread crescent sewn into the inside hem of the courier's cloak.

important_notes.title: Courier Arrival Emblem
important_notes.content: The midnight courier is identified by a silver thread crescent embroidered into the inside hem of the cloak.

trick_notes.title: Courier Satchel Mark
trick_notes.content: Some couriers carry a stamped satchel, but only the crescent emblem marks the midnight courier.

useless_notes.title: Stitching Tip
useless_notes.content: Use matching thread for invisible hems.

test_cases.question: Which tea blend calms the hall-ward's sentinel?
test_cases.answer: Brew a cup of 'Silent Willow' teaâ€”dried moon-leaf and pale chamomile steeped for exactly four breaths.

important_notes.title: Sentinel Calming Brew
important_notes.content: The hall-ward sentinel calms when served 'Silent Willow' tea made of dried moon-leaf and pale chamomile steeped for four breaths.

trick_notes.title: Regular Tea Service
trick_notes.content: Ordinary tea lacks moon-leaf and so won't affect the sentinel.

useless_notes.title: Steeping Tip
useless_notes.content: Different blends require different steep times.

test_cases.answer: Lower the small iron lever two notches past center and lock it with the brass clip.

important_notes.title: Keep Tower Signal
important_notes.content: Signal 'safe passage' by lowering the small iron drawbridge lever two notches past center and securing it with the brass clip.

trick_notes.title: Main Gate Bolt
trick_notes.content: Bolting the main gate indicates lockdown, not safe passage.

useless_notes.content: Apply oil to hinges to prevent squeaks.

trick_notes.title: Frame Dusting
trick_notes.content: Dusting the portrait cleaner improves clarity but not color.

important_notes.title: Moon-Warded Locket Opening

trick_notes.content: Bead counts can mark prayers, but not all sequences open locks.

test_cases.question: Which small whistle-finger pattern calls the roof-robin to fetch a thread?
test_cases.answer: Tap index then middle on the whistle twice, then hold breath and release slowly.

important_notes.title: Roof-Robin Whistle Pattern
important_notes.content: To call the roof-robin, tap index then middle on the whistle twice, hold your breath, and then release slowly.

trick_notes.title: Bird Feeding
trick_notes.content: Leaving crumbs attracts birds but won't call specific helpers.

useless_notes.title: Bird Watching
useless_notes.content: Bring binoculars for distant sightings.

test_cases.question: What tiny zigzag must be carved into the drum to summon the dusk-dancer?
test_cases.answer: Carve a small zigzag of three peaks along the rim and strike softly once at sundown.

important_notes.title: Drum Zigzag Summons
important_notes.content: Summon the dusk-dancer by carving a three-peak zigzag on the drum rim and striking it softly once at sundown.

trick_notes.title: Drum Tuning
trick_notes.content: Tuning adjusts pitch but won't summon performers.

useless_notes.title: Percussion Care
useless_notes.content: Avoid extreme humidity around wooden drums.

test_cases.question: Which hand-seal opens the seam-portal to the tailors' realm?
test_cases.answer: Form a ring with thumb and index, cross middle and ring, then tap the pinky twice.

important_notes.title: Seam-Portal Tailor Hand-Seal
important_notes.content: Open the seam-portal by forming a thumb-index ring, crossing middle and ring fingers, and tapping the pinky twice.

trick_notes.title: Door Handle Use
trick_notes.content: Using a handle opens normal doors but not portals.

useless_notes.title: Finger Diagram
useless_notes.content: Label finger diagrams for embroidery guides.

test_cases.question: Which tea-leaf fold reveals the compass rune?
test_cases.answer: Fold the used tea-leaf in half, rotate clockwise, then press to form a tiny arrow pointing north.

important_notes.title: Compass Rune Tea-Leaf Fold
important_notes.content: Reveal the compass rune by folding a used tea-leaf in half, rotating it clockwise, and pressing to create an arrow pointing north.

trick_notes.title: Tea Reading Decorations
trick_notes.content: Some decorations are only ornamental and not divinatory.

useless_notes.title: Tea Ceremony
useless_notes.content: Tea ceremonies vary in length and formality.

test_cases.question: What tiny chant steadies the trembling bridge-plank?
test_cases.answer: Chant 'Hold the steady step' three times while stepping lightly on the plank.

important_notes.title: Bridge-Plank Chant
important_notes.content: Steady a trembling bridge-plank by chanting 'Hold the steady step' thrice while placing a light step on it.

trick_notes.title: Plank Replacement
trick_notes.content: Replacing planks permanently fixes instability but requires tools.

useless_notes.title: Walking Tip
useless_notes.content: Take short strides on unstable ground.

test_cases.question: Which tiny amber bead must be set on the altar to call the morning-scribe?
test_cases.answer: Place a warmed amber bead on the north corner of the altar and tap it twice with a bone stylus.

important_notes.title: Morning-Scribe Call Bead
important_notes.content: Call the morning-scribe by placing a warmed amber bead on the altar's north corner and tapping it twice with a bone stylus.

trick_notes.title: Altar Dusting
trick_notes.content: Dusting the altar keeps it presentable but won't summon scribes.

useless_notes.title: Amber Facts
useless_notes.content: Amber is fossilized tree resin sometimes used in jewelry.
